about_the_game:
The chaos of January 6th has taken a darker turn. As the dead rise and the White House descends into madness, an insurrection of the undead threatens to consume the entire nation.

Undead Presidents – A Nation Divided… by the Undead.

  • Old-school, round-based zombie survival with modern mechanics and a satirical twist.

  • Solo or co-op multiplayer – team up with up to 8 players online or dominate in classic split-screen action.

  • Iconic, over-the-top world leaders – play as Barry O’Bomber, Donny Drum, Vladislav Pushin, or Manny Macaroon—otherwise suit up as a Secret Service Grunt tasked with protecting our dear leaders.

  • Dynamic maps with multiple approaches, hidden secrets, and high-risk, high-reward pathways.

  • Survival – Work together with your fellow survivors to outlast endless waves of the undead.

  • Grief – Outlive and sabotage your enemies. Work with your team to grief your way to victory!

  • Easter eggs and secret missions to uncover the deeper mysteries behind the outbreak.

  • Extraordinary and experimental weaponry inspired by conspiracy theories, classified projects, and deranged scientific minds.

Unleash Your Creativity – Mod Support Included!

🛠 Full Trenchbroom Mapping Support – If you can dream it, you can build it. With Ease.

🚨 Note:

  • The game is in development and features detailed here are subject to change

  • This is a work of parody and is not affiliated with or endorsed by any real individuals

Make America Un-Dead Again! 🧟‍♂️ 🦅

content_descriptors.notes: Depiction of violence, decapitation and dismemberment to the undead.

detailed_description:
The chaos of January 6th has taken a darker turn. As the dead rise and the White House descends into madness, an insurrection of the undead threatens to consume the entire nation.

Undead Presidents – A Nation Divided… by the Undead.

  • Old-school, round-based zombie survival with modern mechanics and a satirical twist.

  • Solo or co-op multiplayer – team up with up to 8 players online or dominate in classic split-screen action.

  • Iconic, over-the-top world leaders – play as Barry O’Bomber, Donny Drum, Vladislav Pushin, or Manny Macaroon—otherwise suit up as a Secret Service Grunt tasked with protecting our dear leaders.

  • Dynamic maps with multiple approaches, hidden secrets, and high-risk, high-reward pathways.

  • Survival – Work together with your fellow survivors to outlast endless waves of the undead.

  • Grief – Outlive and sabotage your enemies. Work with your team to grief your way to victory!

  • Easter eggs and secret missions to uncover the deeper mysteries behind the outbreak.

  • Extraordinary and experimental weaponry inspired by conspiracy theories, classified projects, and deranged scientific minds.

Unleash Your Creativity – Mod Support Included!

🛠 Full Trenchbroom Mapping Support – If you can dream it, you can build it. With Ease.

🚨 Note:

  • The game is in development and features detailed here are subject to change

  • This is a work of parody and is not affiliated with or endorsed by any real individuals

Make America Un-Dead Again! 🧟‍♂️ 🦅

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04+
  • Processor: 4 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra
  • Processor: 3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Big Sur
  • Processor: 4 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

name: Undead Presidents

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: 3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 4 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Undead Presidents is a chaotic, round-based zombie survival shooter with a satirical twist. Play as infamous world leaders in solo or 8-player co-op, battling undead hordes while uncovering dark conspiracies. Arm yourself with insane weaponry and rewrite history—one zombie at a time.
